sentences.en: Air is the element of man.
sentences.cn: 空气是人类的生存环境.

sentences.en: Any investment involves an element of risk.
sentences.cn: 任何投资都有一定的风险。

sentences.en: Business and management elements are built into the course.
sentences.cn: 本课程加入了商务和管理方面的内容。

sentences.en: Carbon is an element, while carbon dioxide is a compound.
sentences.cn: 碳是一种(化学)元素, 而二氧化碳则是一种化合物.

sentences.en: Cost was a key element in our decision.
sentences.cn: 价钱是我们决策时考虑的主要因素。

sentences.en: He is devoting much of his energy to implanting an element of distrust in the community.
sentences.cn: 他竭力在社区内撒播猜疑的种子。

sentences.en: Hydrogen is a one - valence element.
I am out of my element when people start talking about music.
sentences.cn: 人们一谈论起音乐我就感到茫然.

sentences.en: I suppose people do it because there is that element of danger and risk.
sentences.cn: 我想人们这样做是因为其中存在危险和风险的因素。

sentences.en: Magnesium is the nutrient element in plant growth.
sentences.cn: 镁是植物生长的营养要素.

sentences.en: My stepmother was in her element, organizing everything.
sentences.cn: 我的继母得心应手地料理着一切。

sentences.en: The criticisms have at least an element of truth and validity.
sentences.cn: 那些批评至少有一丝真实性和合理性。

sentences.en: There is an element of exhibitionism in the parents' performance too.
sentences.cn: 那对父母的表现也显得有些爱出风头。

sentences.en: They have started showing a strong soul element in their sound.
sentences.cn: 他们的音乐风格开始表现出一种强烈的灵乐特色。

sentences.en: With its unique heating element it makes perfect coffee.
sentences.cn: 其独特的电热元件使它能够煮出非常美味的咖啡。

sentences.en: You will probably notice an element of quirkiness in his behaviour.
sentences.cn: 你可能会发现他的行为有点怪异。

words.tran_cn: 基本的；主要的；自然力的；四大要素的（土、水、气、火）
基本的；初级的；[化学] 元素的

phrases.tran_cn: 有限元模式，有限元模型；有限单元体模式；有限要素模型

trans.tran_cn: 要素，组成部分，一群人，些许，〈化〉元素，电热元件，风雨
trans.tran_en: one part or feature of a whole system, plan, piece of work etc, especially one that is basic or important
